column4: Does anyone know how to see a hidden program that is eating up memory? =P

I know that, it's hidden.  That's what I meant by hidden.  As in, it seems to truly, actually be hidden.  Showing all processes doesn't do it.  ps faux doesn't show it.  There is something eating 8MBs per every 5 seconds that does not show up.  It has to be in something which is not reporting memory use.
hmm I want to stick around and see the solution to your problem them :P. Sounds very mysterious lol
